<title level="1" right="Rules">[Devastating Attacks](/Rules.aspx?ID=1361)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 196</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
At 4th level, your weapon and unarmed Strikes deal two damage dice instead of one. This increases to three at 12th level and to four at 19th level.
</column>
